messages.content: There was a shooting involving a black Audi with no plates. The suspect is a black male, 25 to 30, driving at a high speed.
Can you confirm the location of the shooting?
It's near Bradley and Magnolia. The suspect in that shooting matches the description.
We have officers responding. Can you stay on the line and provide more details?
Yes, the vehicle was a black Audi around 5 years old, and the suspect was armed with a shotgun. He was last seen eastbound on University from 45th.
We have units en route and setting up a perimeter. Is there anything else you can add?
Thank you. Please stay safe and avoid the area. Officers are handling the situation.
